Stages II PMT/ PET Apply Dates:

  • Starting Date for Apply Online: 13-02-2023 from 03:00 PM
  • Last Date to Apply Online: 20-02-2023 by 05:00 PM
  • Date for PET/ PST Exam: From 14-03-2023 (Postponed)
  • Date for FWT Exam: Last Week of April 2023

Stages II PMT/ PET Apply Dates (New):

  • Starting Date for Apply Online: 11-11-2024 from 03:00 PM
  • Last Date to Apply Online: 21-11-2024 to 05:00 PM
  • Date of PMT/ PET Exam: Last week of December, 2024 tentatively

Age Limit (as on 01-07-2022)

  • Minimum Age Limit: 18 Years
  • Maximum Age limit for Local to AP & Also Working in AP Police Dept: 34 Years
  • i.e., must have been born not earlier than 02-07-1988 and not later than 01-07-2004
  • Maximum Age Limit for Others: 26 Years
  • i.e., must have been born not earlier than 02-07-1996 and not later than 01-07-2004
  • Maximum Age Limit for Widows/ Divorced Women/ Woman Judicially separated from her husband of SC & ST Categories: 42 Years
  • i.e., must have been born not earlier than 02-07-1980 and not later than 01-07-2004
  • Widows/ Divorced Women/ Woman Judicially separated from her husband (Others): 37 Years
  • i.e., must have been born not earlier than 02-07-1985 and not later than 01-07-2004
  • Age Relaxation is Applicable as per Rules.

Qualification (as on 01-07-2022)

For Both Post Codes: 21 & 23

  • For All Candidates: Candidate Should Posses Intermediate or Its Equivalent.
  • For SC/ ST Candidates: Candidate Should Posses SSC or Its Equivalent.

Physical Standards

Physical Measurements Test (PMT)

For all Candidates: 

i)Men: For Post Code No: 21 & 23

  • Height: Must not be less than 167.6 CMS
  • Chest: Must not be less than 86.3 CMS Round the chest on full inspiration with a minimum expansion of 5 CMS

ii)Women: For the Post Code No: 21

  • Height: Must not be less than 152.5 CMS
  • Weight: Must not be less than 40 Kgs

For ST & Aboriginal Tribes of Srikakulam, Vizianagaram, Vishakapatnam, East Godavari & West Godavari:

i)Men: For the Post Code No: 21 & 23

  • Height: Must not be less than 160 CMS
  • Chest: Must not be less than 80 CMS Round the chest on full inspiration with a minimum expansion of 3 CMS

ii)Women: For the Post Code No: 21

  • Height: Must not be less than 150 CMS
  • Weight: Must not be less than 38 Kgs

Physical Efficiency Test (PET)

  • For Senior Demonstrator: Candidates Should Possess PG/ Ph. D (Relevant Discipline)
  • For Junior Demonstrator: Candidates Should Possess M.A./M.Sc./ MPH (Health Management/Health Administration/Health Economics)
  • For Junior/ Senior Demonstrator (Medical & Non Medical): Candidates Should Possess MBBS/ PG/ Ph. D (Concerned Subject).
  • For More Details Refer Notification.

Post Date: 07-11-2024

Latest Update : 09-11-2024

Brief Information: Kerala Pareeksha Bhavan has announced notification for the recruitment of Teachers (Kerala TET November 2024) vacancy. Those Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the Notification & Apply online.

Kerala Pareeksha Bhavan

Kerala TET November 2024

WWW.FREEJOBALERT.COM

Download Mobile App

Application Fee

  • For Each Category: Rs. 500/-
  • For SC/ ST/ Differently Abled Candidates: Rs. 250/- 
  • Payment Mode: Through Net Banking, Credit/ Debit Card)

Important Dates

  • Starting Date to Apply Online: 11-11-2024
  • Last Date to Apply Online & Payment Off Fee : 20-11-2024
  • Last Date for Printout of Application: 20-11-2024
  • Date for Download Admit Card : 08-01-2025
  • Date of Exam : 18-01-2025 & 19-01-2025

Age Limit

  • There is no age limit to apply for KTET 2024 Exam.
  • Refer notification for more details.

Qualification

For Paper/ Category 1 – Lower Primary Classes (Class 1-5):

  • 12th/ 10+2 (or it’s equivalent) with a minimum of 45% marks. Also must have passed the Trained Teachers Certificate or Diploma in Education (TTC/D.Ed/DLEd) 
  • Higher Secondary/ Senior Secondary (or it’s equivalent) with at least 45% marks and 2-year Diploma in Education (Special Education).
  • 12th/ 10+2 (or it’s equivalent) with at least 50% marks along with qualifying 2-year diploma in elementary education
  • 12th/ 10+2 (or it’s equivalent) with at least 50% marks and a degree in 4 years Bachelor of Elementary Education (B.El.Ed.)

For Paper/ Category II – Upper Primary Classes (Class 6-8)

  • B.Ed. Two-year Diploma/TTC/ D.Ed/ D.L.Ed in Elementary Education along with any other eligible degree to apply for the course. Must pass.
    Otherwise
    B.Ed with 45% marks. Bachelor in Education (B.Ed)/DLEd qualification along with any eligible degree (NCTE will be applicable) to apply for the course. Rules issued from time to time
    Otherwise
    4 years Bachelor in Elementary Education (B.El.Ed) with pass in Higher Secondary/Senior Secondary (Equivalent) with 50% marks
    Otherwise
    4 years B.Sc/BA in Education (BA.Ed Or B.Sc.Ed) with pass in Higher Secondary/Senior Secondary (Equivalent) with 50% marks.
    Otherwise
    BBA degree awarded or recognized by universities in Kerala if other qualifications are required to write K.TET Category 2.12
    Final year students of D.Ed/D.El.Ed and B.Ed can also apply. While applying for K.TET, a certificate from the head of the institution that you are a 2nd year student must be produced.

Paper/ Category III – High School Classes (Class 9-12)

  • Graduation with BA/ BSc/ B.Com degree securing at least 45% marks along with a B.Ed.
  • Degree in the subject concerned with MSc.Ed. Degree.

Paper/ Category IV – Language Teachers

  • Candidates, possessing a Certificate/ Diploma/ Degree in teaching in any subject, and are approved by Universities/ NCTE/ Board of Examinations/ Government of Kerala, are eligible to apply.
  • Those candidates who have acquired qualifications for the posts of Language Teachers of Arabic, Hindi, Sanskrit & Urdu (up to Upper Primary level), Specialist teachers & Physical Education teachers as mentioned in Chapter XXXI of Kerala Education Act And Rules can apply for Kerala TET 2024 Paper IV.

For more Qualification Details Refer the notification.

Those Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the Notification & Apply Online.
Telangana.contentHtml:
Name of the Post: TG TET 2024 Online Form

Post Date: 08-11-2024

Brief Information: Government of Telangana State, School Education Department has published a notification to conducting Telangana Teacher Eligibility Test (TG TET-2024) for the recruitment of Teachers for Classes I to VIII in Schools of Telangana State. Those Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the Notification & Apply Online.

School Education Department, Telangana

TG TET-2024

WWW.FREEJOBALERT.COM

Download Mobile App

Application Fee

  • For Single Paper (i.e. only Paper I or only Paper II): Rs. 750/-
  • For both Paper I and II: Rs. 1000/-
  • Payment Mode: Through Online

Important Dates

  • Date of Notification : 04-11-2024
  • Download of TG-TET-2024-II Information Bulletin, Detailed Notification: 07-11-2024
  • Starting Date to Apply Online & Payment of Fee: 07-11-2024
  • Last Date to Apply Online & Payment of Fee: 20-11-2024
  • Help Desk services on all working days : 07-11-2024 to 05-02-2025
  • Date of Download of Hall Tickets : 26-12-2024 onwards
  • Date of Exam: 01-01-2025 to 20-01-2025 (Timings 9.00 AM to 11.30 AM & 2.00 PM to 4.30 PM)
  • Declaration of Results : 05-02-2025

Qualification

  • For TG-TET Paper-I (Classes I to V): Candidates Should Possess Intermediate / Senior Secondary (or its equivalent) with at least 50% marks. However in case of SC/ST/BC/Differently abled candidates, the minimum marks shall be 45%. AND pass in 2 – year Diploma in Elementary Education /4-year Bachelor of Elementary Education (B.El.Ed.) / 2 – year Diploma in Education (Special Education).

OR

  • Intermediate / Senior Secondary (or its equivalent) with atleast 45% marks. In respect of SC / ST / BC / Differently abled candidates, the minimum marks shall be 40%. AND pass in 2 – year Diploma in Elementary Education / 4-year Bachelor of Elementary Education (B.El.Ed.) / 2 – year Diploma in Education (Special Education) in case of the candidates who have passed or admitted to D.El.Ed / D.Ed., course prior to issue of these guidelines (23-12-2015)
  • For TG-TET Paper-II (Classes VI to VIII): Candidates Should Possess B.A./B.Sc./B.Com., with at least 50% marks. In case of SC/ST/BC/Differently abled candidates, the minimum marks shall be 45%. AND pass in Bachelor of Education (B.Ed) course / Bachelor of Education (B.Ed -Special Education)

OR

  •  B.A./B.Sc./B.Com., with at least 50% marks. In respect of SC/ST/BC/Differently abled candidates, the minimum marks shall be 40%. AND pass in Bachelor of Education (B.Ed) course / Bachelor of Education (B.Ed -Special Education) in case of the candidates who have passed or admitted to B.Ed., course prior to issue of these guidelines (23-12-2015) 

OR

  • 4-year B.A.Ed/B.Sc.Ed., with at least 50% marks, in case of SC/ST/BC/Differently abled candidates, the minimum marks shall be 45%.

OR

  • Graduation with language concerned as one of the optional subjects OR Bachelor of oriental language (or its equivalent) OR Graduation in literature OR Post Graduation in language concerned AND Language Pandit Training Certificate/B.Ed with language concerned as one of the Methodologies, in respect of Language Teachers.

OR

  • B.E/B.Tech with at least 50% marks. In respect of SC/ST/BC/Differently abled candidates, the minimum marks shall be 45% and Pass in Bachelor of Education (B.Ed.) or B.Ed. (Special Education).
  • For More Details Refer Notification.

  • Starting Date for Apply Online: 07-11-2024 (12:00 AM)
  • Last Date to Apply Online: 16-11-2024 (till 15:00 hrs)
  • The last date for depositing the application form in the acceptance center: 19-11-2024 (till 17.00 hours)

Age Limit

  • Minimum Age limit : 18 Years
  • Maximum Age limit for Primary School (Standard 1 to 5) : 33 Years
  • Maximum Age limit for Upper Primary School (Class 6 to 8) : 35 Years
  • Age Relaxation applicable as per Rules

Qualification

Upper Primary (Class 06 to 08) Vidhya Sahayak (Teaching Assistant) :

  • Assistant Professor of Mathematics/Science: Candidates Should Posses 12th Class/P.T.C./D.EL.Ed/B.Sc. /B.E./B.Tech. /B.PHARM/B.Ed/B.El.Ed/B.Sc.Ed & Must have passed the Teacher Eligibility Test
  • Assistant Professor of Languages: Candidates Should posses 12th Class/ P.T.C./D.EL.Ed/BA/BRS/BSSc (with English,Gujarati,Hindi,Sanskrit as subject)/ B.Ed/B.El.Ed/B.A.Ed & Must have passed the Teacher Eligibility Test
  • Assistant Professor of Social Sciences: 12th Class/P.T.C./D.EL.Ed/BA/BRS/B.Sc. (with History, Geography, Civics, Political Science, Economics, Sociology, Psychology, Philosophy, Home Science and Indian Culture)/B.Com/ B.C.A/ BBA/B.El.Ed/B.A.Ed / B.R.S.Ed / B.S.Sc.Ed / B.Com.B.Ed/B.Ed.(Special Education).

Lower Primary (Class  01 to 05) Vidhya Sahayak (Teaching Assistant) : :

  • Candidates Should Posses :  12th Class/ Diploma (Special Education)P.T.C./D.El.Ed/B.El.Ed/Should have passed the Lower Primary Teacher Eligibility Test
